thread.title: Steven Lefavour

author: Steven Lefavour
title: Steven Lefavour
text: Placed the order. Now I'm waiting. Yup, just waiting for my bulbs. This is kind of an anticlimax because my shopping experience on their website was really good, clear, easy to navigate and discover products. I then compared 1000Bulbs with other online merchants and they ended up at the top of my list. Hope I'll be able to edit this review in a month.
